languages.text: "Система Фтона потеряна для Человечества. Нет средств, способных остановить то, что было начато руками Эмелины".
"The Phton System is lost to Humanity. We have no way of stopping what Emelina started."
languages.original_text: "Система Фтона потеряна для Человечества. Нет средств, способных остановить то, что было начато руками Эмелины".

traits.locale_text: "The Phton System is lost to Humanity. We have no way of stopping what Emelina started."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The Phton System is lost to Humanity. We have no way of stopping what Emelina started."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The Phton System is lost to Humanity. We have no way of stopping what Emelina started."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The Phton System is lost to Humanity. We have no way of stopping what Emelina started."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “人类已经彻底失去了菲顿星系，我们没有任何办法可以挽回艾米莉娜犯下的错误。”
languages.original_text: "The Phton System is lost to Humanity. We have no way of stopping what Emelina started."

traits.locale_text: “人类已经彻底失去了菲顿星系，我们没有任何办法可以挽回艾米莉娜犯下的错误。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Le système de Phton est perdu à tout jamais. Nous n'avons aucun moyen d'arrêter ce qu'Emelina a commencé. »
languages.original_text: "The Phton System is lost to Humanity. We have no way of stopping what Emelina started."

traits.locale_text: « Le système de Phton est perdu à tout jamais. Nous n'avons aucun moyen d'arrêter ce qu'Emelina a commencé. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «La Humanidad ha perdido el sistema Phton. No tenemos forma de detener lo que empezó Emelina».
languages.original_text: "The Phton System is lost to Humanity. We have no way of stopping what Emelina started."

traits.locale_text: «La Humanidad ha perdido el sistema Phton. No tenemos forma de detener lo que empezó Emelina».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「プトン・システムは人類のものではない。エメリナが始めたことを止める術はないのだ」
languages.original_text: "The Phton System is lost to Humanity. We have no way of stopping what Emelina started."

traits.locale_text: 「プトン・システムは人類のものではない。エメリナが始めたことを止める術はないのだ」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Das Phton-System ist für die Menschheit verloren. Wir können nicht aufhalten, was Emelina in Gang gesetzt hat."
languages.original_text: "The Phton System is lost to Humanity. We have no way of stopping what Emelina started."

traits.locale_text: "Das Phton-System ist für die Menschheit verloren. Wir können nicht aufhalten, was Emelina in Gang gesetzt hat."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "The Phton System is lost to Humanity. We have no way of stopping what Emelina started."

languages.text: "İnsanlık, Phton Sistemi'ni kaybetti. Emelina'nın başlattığını durdurmamıza imkân yok."
languages.original_text: "The Phton System is lost to Humanity. We have no way of stopping what Emelina started."

traits.locale_text: "Phton Sistemi, İnsanlığa kaybedildi. Emelina'nın başlattığını durdurmamıza imkân yok."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
